about_the_game:
Restart ShuHan Dynasty：Origin is an immersive interactive video game set in the history of The Three Kingdoms from the perspective of "Liu Bei", which incorporates modern anecdotes and suspense elements.

Classic again new concept interpretation:

You will travel to the Eastern Han Dynasty of China, get a new identity - Liu Bei. In a gripping story, every choice you make will directly or indirectly affect the end of the game, and every step can lead to another intricate story line, opening up new life possibilities. The branches are huge, the overall story is rich, and you can play them over and over again, collecting completely different endings and unlocking one hidden achievement after another.

Clever ideas combined with the game:

The game interspersed with a number of interesting small games, intense stimulation, for the interactive film game to bring a different fresh experience.

Create scene art by heart:

The production team takes the CCTV 94 version of the classic romance of The Three Kingdoms as a reference example, and strives to bring you the original atmosphere.

The interpenetration of reality and memory, the occasional disarranged character, and the plot development that does not follow memory, all seem to be the intricate root system entrenched in the ground, or perhaps a little ash in the yellow sand. Fate turns into thousands of silk threads, placing everyone in an overwhelming net.
